rukus.text: Musa no min wa, kare no (satta)-go, jibun no soshoku-hin de nakigoe no deru katachi dake no koushi o tsukutta. Kare-ra wa sore ga mono mo iwazu, mata michian'nai mo dekinai koto ga wakaranai no ka. Kare-ra wa sore o (kami to shite) tori, fugi o okonatta

Kare-ra wa jibun-tachi no ayamachi ga wakari, hidoku kuyanda toki ni itta. `Hontoni omo ga jihi o Shi kosa rezu, mata sono o yurushi ga nakattanaraba, watashi-tachi wa kitto shippai-sha no nakamadeatta

Musa wa sono min no moto ni kaetta toki, gekido shi, kanashinde itta. `Anata gataga, watashi no fuzai-chu ni itta koto wa wazawaidearu. Anata gata wa omo no shinpan o saisoku suru no ka.' Kare wa itabi o nage, kare no ani no atama (no kami) o æ‘‘Nde gutto hikiyoseta. Kare (harun) wa itta. `Watashi no haha no ko yo, hontoni hitobito wa watashi o muryokuda to shi, mata watashi o hotondo korosan bakarideatta. Dakara watashi (no teochi) ni taishi, teki o yorokoba senaide kure. Mata watashi o fugi no hitobito to issho ni minasanaide kure
Kare (musa) wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, watashi to watashi no ani o yurushi, anata no jihi ni yoku sa sete kudasai. Hontoni anata wa, jihibukai-sha no naka demo mottomo jihibukai katadesu
